reviewText: there are many data mining books out there that start from a general beginning perspective and work you up, and those that start at an advanced level.  this is definitely the latter.  it presupposes a sophisticated math background and proceeds from there.  if you fit that category, you'll be highly pleased with the book. if you do not have the background, find a different book and look forward to reading this later.
title: Data Mining and Business Analytics with R
